dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Wha- pirates? What are you talking about now, Hally?

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: Pirates!? I wanna fight pirates! Lemme at ‘em!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: (laughs gently) That could be fun.I read some books about the Caribbean Sea and how pirates have caused problems in the past. Perhaps we could fight them off and save the sea!How do we defeat them though?

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Heh, you don’t talk much, but you have some good ideas, Ed.

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: Awesome! Looks like there are some canons and generators to help us fight them too.

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: I see the captain of the ship! His beard is on fire! He looks like a meanie. (giggles)

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: He looks tough. I’m gonna defeat him all by myself!

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: (giggles) You can’t surround someone by yourself, Jade. I really want to be captain of the ship

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: Yay! Then I can sail it to outer space!

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: I’ll race you to the ship!

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: ...and make a lot of alien friends...

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Heh, this is silly. But I guess it could be fun. Let’s GO!
